gpt_critique.critique: Model B’s broader inferences extend beyond explicit text; the course clearly supports RCP-related ethics and sustainability, justifying a higher score for Responsible Consumption and Production.

gemini_critique.critique: Model A provided a more comprehensive interpretation of the course text, particularly regarding inferred connections to several SDGs. My initial analysis was too conservative, leading to several revisions.
